name: Infurn
overview:
INFURN produces famous designer furniture that were designed in the period between 1900 and 1986, which have reached an acclaimed and iconic design status. These timeless and unique classics are the inspiration behind our company. These statement pieces are much more than just furniture. They have become pieces of art, which INFURN produces accurately as they were designed by the famous designers many years ago.

At INFURN we focus our production on the top 400 design classics, with a large spectrum of materials and colours for individual choice. Delivering to more than 20 countries, our handmade, custom-built pieces undergo strict quality control and inspection during and after production. Only the highest standard of materials and fabrics are used for the creation of these design icons. INFURN provides all of its products with a full five-year warranty ensuring the precision and individual attention to every detail in the production process. Our most important stamp of quality is our over 100,000 happy customers worldwide. INFURN is part of a group of companies and a subsidiary of INFURN HOLDINGS PLC (www.infurn-holdings.com) which is included in the Regulated Unofficial Market of the Stuttgart Stock Exchange.
